DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: DELETE FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_MSTR WHERE MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?
DELETE FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?)
DELETE FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_DOMN_INFO WHERE MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?
DELETE FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_PRCG_INFO WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?)
DELETE FROM MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_VRBL_INFO WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?)
DELETE FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?)
DELETE FROM TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?)
DELETE FROM LGCY_MJR_NOTE WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?)
DELETE FROM LGCY_MINOR_NOTE WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?)
DELETE FROM LGCY_VAR_NOTE WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?)

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: DELETE FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ? and MGRTN_CMPLTD_FLAG='N')
DELETE FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_PRCG_INFO WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ? and MGRTN_CMPLTD_FLAG='N')
DELETE FROM MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_VRBL_INFO WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ? and MGRTN_CMPLTD_FLAG='N')
DELETE FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ? and MGRTN_CMPLTD_FLAG='N')
DELETE FROM LGCY_MJR_NOTE WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?)
DELETE FROM LGCY_MINOR_NOTE WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?)
DELETE FROM LGCY_VAR_NOTE WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?)
DELETE FROM TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID in (select MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?)

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT distinct(SELECT ITEM.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM.CTLG_ID = 1936 AND ITEM.PRMRY_CD = A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA) PVA, (SELECT ITEM.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM.CTLG_ID = 1938 AND ITEM.PRMRY_CD = A.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID) REF, B.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC ,A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID,F.LGCY_VRBL_ID, (SELECT V_INFO.VAL_CODED_ON_CNTRCT FROM MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_VRBL_INFO V_INFO WHERE V_INFO.MGRTD_VRBL_ID = F.LGCY_VRBL_ID AND V_INFO.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ={4}) VAR_VAL, 1 AS FLAG, H.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND, F.LGCY_VRBL_DTL, A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA, B.bnft_lvl_sqnc, (select L.MGRT_NOTE_FLAG from LGCY_VAR_NOTE L where L.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID and L.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {19} and L.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ={4}) NOTES_FLAG, (SELECT V_INFO.MGRTD_VRBL_NOTE_FLAG FROM MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_VRBL_INFO V_INFO WHERE V_INFO.MGRTD_VRBL_ID = F.LGCY_VRBL_ID AND V_INFO.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ={4}) VAR_NOTE_FLAG FROM BLN_BNFT_LINE A, BLVL_BNFT_LVL B, BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR C , BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR D , BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN E, -- FOR SELECTING MAPPED VARIABLE VALUE MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL F ,DTYP_DATA_TYPE H, PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD z WHERE -- FOR SELECTING MAPPED VARIABLE VALUE A.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = H.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID(+) AND z.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND z.PROD_SYS_ID = {18} AND z.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {19} AND F.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = z.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = F.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID (+) AND F.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID not in (SELECT BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID FROM TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {4}) AND A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID= B.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND B.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = C.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND E.BNFT_SYS_ID = C.BNFT_SYS_ID AND E.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} AND D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} AND F.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_IDENFITIER ={12} AND F.PROD_STRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID ={14} AND z.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG ='F' UNION SELECT distinct(SELECT ITEM.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM.CTLG_ID = 1936 AND ITEM.PRMRY_CD = A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA) PVA, (SELECT ITEM.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM.CTLG_ID = 1938 AND ITEM.PRMRY_CD = A.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID) REF, B.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC ,A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID, F.LGCY_VRBL_ID, (SELECT V_INFO.VAL_CODED_ON_CNTRCT FROM MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_VRBL_INFO V_INFO WHERE V_INFO.MGRTD_VRBL_ID = F.LGCY_VRBL_ID AND V_INFO.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ={9}) VAR_VAL, 0 AS FLAG, H.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND, F.LGCY_VRBL_DTL, A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA, B.bnft_lvl_sqnc, (select L.MGRT_NOTE_FLAG from LGCY_VAR_NOTE L where L.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID and L.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {19} and L.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ={4}) NOTES_FLAG, (SELECT V_INFO.MGRTD_VRBL_NOTE_FLAG FROM MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_VRBL_INFO V_INFO WHERE V_INFO.MGRTD_VRBL_ID = F.LGCY_VRBL_ID AND V_INFO.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ={4}) VAR_NOTE_FLAG FROM BLN_BNFT_LINE A, BLVL_BNFT_LVL B, BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR C , BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR D , BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN E, -- FOR SELECTING MAPPED VARIABLE VALUE TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG F, DTYP_DATA_TYPE H, -- BNFT_LINE_OVRD_VAL z PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD z WHERE -- FOR SELECTING MAPPED VARIABLE VALUE A.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = H.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID(+) AND A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = F.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID (+) AND z.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND z.PROD_SYS_ID = {20} AND z.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {21} and F.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = z.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID= B.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND B.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = C.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND E.BNFT_SYS_ID = C.BNFT_SYS_ID AND E.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_SYS_ID = {2} AND D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={3} AND F.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {4} AND F.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={13} and F.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID ={15} AND z.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG ='F' UNION SELECT distinct (SELECT ITEM.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM.CTLG_ID = 1936 AND ITEM.PRMRY_CD = A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA) PVA, (SELECT ITEM.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM.CTLG_ID = 1938 AND ITEM.PRMRY_CD = A.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID) REF, B.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC ,A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID, '' LGCY_VRBL_ID, '' VAL_CODED_ON_CNTRCT, 2 AS FLAG, H.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND,'' LGCY_VRBL_DTL, A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA, B.bnft_lvl_sqnc, (select L.MGRT_NOTE_FLAG from LGCY_VAR_NOTE L where L.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID and L.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {19} and L.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ={4}) NOTES_FLAG, '' MGRTD_VRBL_NOTE_FLAG FROM BLN_BNFT_LINE A, BLVL_BNFT_LVL B, BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR C , BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR D , BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN E, -- FOR SELECTING MAPPED VARIABLE VALUE DTYP_DATA_TYPE H, PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD z WHERE -- FOR SELECTING MAPPED VARIABLE VALUE A.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = H.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID(+) AND z.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND z.PROD_SYS_ID = {22} AND z.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {23} AND A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID= B.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND B.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = C.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND E.BNFT_SYS_ID = C.BNFT_SYS_ID AND E.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND z.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND C.BNFT_SYS_ID = {7} AND D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={8} AND z.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID NOT IN (SELECT BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID FROM TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {4} AND TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {17}) AND z.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID NOT IN (SELECT BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID FROM MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL WHERE MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_IDENFITIER ={6} AND MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL.PROD_STRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID ={16}) ORDER BY bnft_lvl_sqnc

select distinct A.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID from MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL A, TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG B where A.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID and B.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} and A.PROD_STRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID = B.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID and A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_IDENFITIER = B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and A.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID and A.LGCY_VRBL_ID != B.LGCY_VRBL_ID

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT distinct B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, B.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, Y.BNFT_SYS_ID, X.BNFT_ID_NM, A.SQNC_NBR,Y.SQNC_NBR FROM PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN A, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR B, PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD C, BMST_BNFT_MSTR X, BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN Y WHERE A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND A.PROD_SYS_ID = {0} AND A.PROD_SYS_ID = C.PROD_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_SYS_ID = Y.BNFT_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND X.BNFT_SYS_ID=Y.BNFT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = Y.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ORDER BY A.SQNC_NBR,Y.SQNC_NBR

SELECT distinct B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, B.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, Y.BNFT_SYS_ID, X.BNFT_ID_NM, A.SQNC_NBR,Y.SQNC_NBR FROM PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN A, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR B, PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD C, BMST_BNFT_MSTR X, BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN Y, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN Z WHERE A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND A.PROD_SYS_ID = {0} AND Z.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {1} AND A.PROD_SYS_ID = C.PROD_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = Z.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_SYS_ID = Y.BNFT_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_SYS_ID = Z.BNFT_SYS_ID AND Z.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND Z.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND X.BNFT_SYS_ID=Y.BNFT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = Y.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ORDER BY A.SQNC_NBR,Y.SQNC_NBR

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID FROM TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG( MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID, BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID, LGCY_VRBL_ID, MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, LAST_CHNGD_USER, LAST_CHNGD_TMS, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP, LGCY_VRBL_DTL) VALUES (?, ?, ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? , ? , ?)
DELETE FROM TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =? AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =? AND BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID=? AND MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID=?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery:
SELECT A.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, A.MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID, A.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT, A.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_RVSN_DT, A.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_EXPRY_DT, A.GRP_SIZE, A.STNDRD_PLAN_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.BNFT_PLAN_NM, A.CRPRT_PLAN_CD, A.FUNDG_ARNGMNT_CD, A.BRND_NM, B.HDQTR_ST_CD, A.LAST_CHNGD_USER, A.LAST_CHNGD_TMS, A.CREATD_USER_ID, A.CREATD_TM_STMP,B.CNTRCT_TYPE, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1940 and PRMRY_CD = A.GRP_SIZE) GRP_SIZE_DESC, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1701 and PRMRY_CD = A.STNDRD_PLAN_CD) STNDRD_PLAN_CD_DESC, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1786 and PRMRY_CD = A.PROD_CD) PROD_CD_DESC, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1947 and PRMRY_CD = A.CRPRT_PLAN_CD) CRPRT_PLAN_CD_DESC, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1941 and PRMRY_CD = A.FUNDG_ARNGMNT_CD) FUNDG_ARNGMNT_DESC, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1626 and PRMRY_CD = B.HDQTR_ST_CD)HDQTR_ST_DESC, (select C.CNTRCT_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR C, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT D where D.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.CNTRCT_BSDT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and C.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = D.CNTRCT_SYS_ID)BASE_CONT_ID , (select D.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR C, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT D where D.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.CNTRCT_BSDT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and C.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = D.CNTRCT_SYS_ID)BASE_CONT_EFF_DT, A.MGRTD_LGCY_DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT , A.LAST_ACSD_PAGE , A.STEP_NBR_CMPLTD, (select CNTRCT_SYS_ID from CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT where DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.CNTRCT_BSDT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) BASE_CONT_SYS_ID , A.CNTRCT_BSDT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, B.MGRTD_CNTRCT_ID, A.COB_ADJDCTN_IND, A.MEDI_ADJDCTN_IND, A.ITS_ADJDCTN_IND, A.RGLTRY_AGNCY, A.CMPLANC_STTS, A.PROJ_NM_CODE, A.CNTRT_TRM_DT, A.MULTI_PLAN_IND, A.PRFRMNCE_GUARTE, A.SALE_MARKT_DT, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 2020 and PRMRY_CD = A.RGLTRY_AGNCY) RGLTRY_AGNCY_DESC, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 2040 and PRMRY_CD = A.PROJ_NM_CODE) PROJ_NM_CODE_DESC, A.EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID
FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR A,MGRTD_CNTRCT_MSTR B WHERE A.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ? and A.MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = B.MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID

SELECT a.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, b.mgrtd_cntrct_id, a.MGRTD_LGCY_DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr a, mgrtd_cntrct_mstr b WHERE a.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id = b.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id AND mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0}

SELECT a.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, b.mgrtd_cntrct_id, a.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr a, mgrtd_cntrct_mstr b WHERE a.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id = b.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id AND a.mgrtd_lgcy_dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt != a.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt AND b.mgrtd_cntrct_id = {0}

SELECT DISTINCT a.cntrct_bsdt_sgmnt_sys_id, a.ewpd_prod_sys_id, a.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, (SELECT c.cntrct_id FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr c, cntrct_dt_sgmnt d WHERE d.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = a.cntrct_bsdt_sgmnt_sys_id AND c.cntrct_sys_id = d.cntrct_sys_id) base_cont_id, (SELECT d.dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr c, cntrct_dt_sgmnt d WHERE d.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = a.cntrct_bsdt_sgmnt_sys_id AND c.cntrct_sys_id = d.cntrct_sys_id) base_cont_eff_dt, (SELECT cntrct_sys_id FROM cntrct_dt_sgmnt WHERE dt_sgmnt_sys_id = a.cntrct_bsdt_sgmnt_sys_id) base_cont_sys_id, (SELECT prod_fmly_nm FROM prod_mstr WHERE prod_sys_id = a.ewpd_prod_sys_id) prod_fam_nam, (SELECT prod_nm FROM prod_mstr WHERE prod_sys_id = a.ewpd_prod_sys_id) prod_nam FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr a, mgrtd_cntrct_mstr b WHERE mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id = (SELECT MAX (mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id) FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr WHERE mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id = {0} AND mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id != {1})

SELECT a.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id, MIN (a.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt), MAX (a.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_expry_dt) FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr a WHERE a.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id IN (SELECT mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr WHERE mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0}) GROUP BY a.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id

SELECT 0, mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id, MAX (mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_expry_dt) FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr, mgrtd_cntrct_mstr WHERE mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id = mgrtd_cntrct_mstr.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id AND mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr.mgrtn_cmpltd_flag IN ('N', 'n') AND mgrtd_cntrct_mstr.mgrtd_cntrct_id = {0} GROUP BY mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id
CALL COPY_MIGRATED_CONTRACT({0}, {1}, {2}, {3}, {4}, {5})

SELECT mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id, mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt, mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_rvsn_dt, mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_expry_dt, grp_size, stndrd_plan_cd, prod_cd, bnft_plan_nm, crprt_plan_cd, fundg_arngmnt_cd, brnd_nm, last_chngd_user, last_chngd_tms, creatd_user_id, creatd_tm_stmp, mgrtd_lgcy_dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt, last_acsd_page, step_nbr_cmpltd,cntrct_bsdt_sgmnt_sys_id,ewpd_prod_sys_id, mgrtd_pstrctr_mapg_sys_id FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr WHERE mgrtn_cmpltd_flag NOT IN ('Y', 'y') AND mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id = {0} order by mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt asc

SELECT mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id, mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt, mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_rvsn_dt, mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_expry_dt, grp_size, stndrd_plan_cd, prod_cd, bnft_plan_nm, crprt_plan_cd, fundg_arngmnt_cd, brnd_nm, last_chngd_user, last_chngd_tms, creatd_user_id, creatd_tm_stmp, mgrtd_lgcy_dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt, last_acsd_page, step_nbr_cmpltd, cob_adjdctn_ind, medi_adjdctn_ind, its_adjdctn_ind, rgltry_agncy, cmplanc_stts, proj_nm_code, cntrt_trm_dt, multi_plan_ind, prfrmnce_guarte, sale_markt_dt FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr WHERE mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0}

SELECT mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr WHERE crprt_plan_cd IS NULL AND mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id IN (SELECT mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr WHERE mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id = {0})
CALL COPY_PRICING_INFO( {0},{1},{2},{3})
CALL COPY_CODED_VARIABLES( {0},{1},{2})

UPDATE MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR SET MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT = ?, MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_RVSN_DT = ?, MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_EXPRY_DT = ?, GRP_SIZE = ?, STNDRD_PLAN_CD = ?, PROD_CD = ?, BNFT_PLAN_NM = ?, CRPRT_PLAN_CD = ?, FUNDG_ARNGMNT_CD = ?, BRND_NM = ?, LAST_CHNGD_USER = ?, LAST_CHNGD_TMS = ?, CREATD_USER_ID = ?, CREATD_TM_STMP = ?, MGRTD_LGCY_DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT = ?, LAST_ACSD_PAGE = ?, STEP_NBR_CMPLTD = ?, COB_ADJDCTN_IND = ?, MEDI_ADJDCTN_IND = ?, ITS_ADJDCTN_IND = ?, RGLTRY_AGNCY = ?, CMPLANC_STTS = ?, PROJ_NM_CODE = ?, CNTRT_TRM_DT = ?, MULTI_PLAN_IND = ?, PRFRMNCE_GUARTE = ?, SALE_MARKT_DT = ?, MGRT_NOTE_FLAG = ?, CNTRCT_BSDT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ? WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ?
DELETE FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ?

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID, BUS_ENTY_CD, BUS_GRP_CD, LOB_CD, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1932 and PRMRY_CD = BUS_ENTY_CD) BUS_ENTY_CD_DESC, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1933 and PRMRY_CD = BUS_GRP_CD) BUS_GRP_CD_DESC, (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1925 and PRMRY_CD = LOB_CD) LOB_CD_DESC FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_DOMN_INFO WHERE MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = {0}

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT d.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, d.cvrg_cd, d.prcg_cd, d.ntwk_cd, -- d.lst_chg_usr, d.lst_chg_tms, d.creatd_tm_stmp, d.creatd_user_id, a.cd_desc_txt, b.cd_desc_txt, c.cd_desc_txt FROM mgrtd_cntrct_prcg_info d, item a, item b, item c WHERE d.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id= {0} AND a.prmry_cd = d.cvrg_cd AND a.ctlg_id = 1695 AND b.prmry_cd = d.prcg_cd AND b.ctlg_id = 1696 AND c.prmry_cd = d.ntwk_cd AND c.ctlg_id = 1749 ORDER BY d.prcg_cd

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery:
select distinct X.BNFT_ID_NM,Y.BNFT_SYS_ID,X.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID ,M.MINOR_HEADING_ID, M.MGRT_NOTE_FLAG,Y.SQNC_NBR
from BMST_BNFT_MSTR X, BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN Y, LGCY_MINOR_NOTE M ,PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD P where X.BNFT_SYS_ID =Y.BNFT_SYS_ID and Y.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} and X.BNFT_SYS_ID = M.BNFT_SYS_ID and P.BNFT_SYS_ID = X.BNFT_SYS_ID and P.PROD_SYS_ID = (select H.EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR H where H.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {2} ) and P.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} and P.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and M.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID= {2} UNION select distinct X.BNFT_ID_NM,Y.BNFT_SYS_ID,X.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID ,'' minor_heading,'' migrate_note_flag,Y.SQNC_NBR from BMST_BNFT_MSTR X, BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN Y ,PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD P where X.BNFT_SYS_ID =Y.BNFT_SYS_ID and Y.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} and P.BNFT_SYS_ID = X.BNFT_SYS_ID and P.PROD_SYS_ID = (select H.EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR H where H.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {2} ) and P.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} and P.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and X.BNFT_SYS_ID NOT IN (SELECT BNFT_SYS_ID FROM LGCY_MINOR_NOTE WHERE BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} and MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID={2}) order by SQNC_NBR

select distinct X.BNFT_ID_NM,Y.BNFT_SYS_ID,X.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID ,M.MINOR_HEADING_ID, M.MGRT_NOTE_FLAG,Y.SQNC_NBR
from BMST_BNFT_MSTR X, BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN Y, LGCY_MINOR_NOTE M ,CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN P where X.BNFT_SYS_ID =Y.BNFT_SYS_ID and Y.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = P.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and X.BNFT_SYS_ID = M.BNFT_SYS_ID and P.BNFT_SYS_ID = X.BNFT_SYS_ID and P.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} and P.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} and P.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and M.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID= {2} UNION select distinct X.BNFT_ID_NM,Y.BNFT_SYS_ID,X.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID ,'' minor_heading,'' migrate_note_flag,Y.SQNC_NBR from BMST_BNFT_MSTR X, BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN Y ,CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN P where X.BNFT_SYS_ID =Y.BNFT_SYS_ID and Y.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = P.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and P.BNFT_SYS_ID = X.BNFT_SYS_ID and P.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} and P.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} and P.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and X.BNFT_SYS_ID NOT IN (SELECT BNFT_SYS_ID FROM LGCY_MINOR_NOTE WHERE BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} and MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID={2}) order by SQNC_NBR

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT A.MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID, A.MGRTD_CNTRCT_ID, A.LGCY_SRC_SYS_NM, A.SLCTD_OPT_TYPE, A.MGRTN_CMPLTD_FLAG, A.PROD_FMLY_CD, A.LGCY_STRCTR_NM, A.CNTRCT_TYPE, A.LAST_CHNGD_USER, A.LAST_CHNGD_TMS, A.CREATD_USER_ID, A.CREATD_TM_STMP, A.HDQTR_ST_CD, A.LAST_ACSD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, B.CNTRCT_BSDT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, B.EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID, B. MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_MSTR A, MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR B WHERE A.MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ? AND B.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID(+) = A.LAST_ACSD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID

SELECT A.MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID, A.MGRTD_CNTRCT_ID, A.LGCY_SRC_SYS_NM, A.SLCTD_OPT_TYPE, A.MGRTN_CMPLTD_FLAG, A.PROD_FMLY_CD, A.LGCY_STRCTR_NM, A.CNTRCT_TYPE, A.LAST_CHNGD_USER, A.LAST_CHNGD_TMS, A.CREATD_USER_ID, A.CREATD_TM_STMP, A.HDQTR_ST_CD, A.LAST_ACSD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, B.CNTRCT_BSDT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, B.EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID, B. MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_MSTR A, MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR B WHERE A.MGRTD_CNTRCT_ID = {0} AND B.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID(+) = A.LAST_ACSD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID

SELECT A.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id, A.mgrtd_cntrct_id, A.lgcy_src_sys_nm, A.slctd_opt_type, A.mgrtn_cmpltd_flag, A.prod_fmly_cd, A.lgcy_strctr_nm, A.cntrct_type, A.hdqtr_st_cd, A.last_acsd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, B.CNTRCT_BSDT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, B.EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID, B. MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID FROM mgrtd_cntrct_mstr A, MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR B WHERE A.mgrtd_cntrct_id = {0} AND B.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID(+) = A.LAST_ACSD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID

DELETE FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_MSTR WHERE MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?
